issue.title: Cron job is not working
issue.body: ### What steps will reproduce the problem? The ERROR: when i run cronjob PHP Notice fwrite(): Write of 69 bytes failed with errno=9 Bad file descriptor 8 yii\base\ErrorException D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\console\Controller.php 331 #0 [internal function]: yii\base\ErrorHandler->handleError(8, 'fwrite(): Write...', 'D:\\HostingSpace...', 331) #1 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\console\Controller.php(331): fwrite(Resource id #419, 'fwrite(): Write...') #2 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\humhub\modules\search\Events.php(38): yii\console\Controller->stderr('fwrite(): Write...') #3 [internal function]: humhub\modules\search\Events::onHourlyCron(Object(yii\base\Event)) #4 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\base\Event.php(312): call_user_func(Array, Object(yii\base\Event)) #5 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\base\Component.php(642): yii\base\Event::trigger('humhub\\commands...', 'hourly', Object(yii\base\Event)) #6 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\humhub\commands\CronController.php(102): yii\base\Component->trigger('hourly') #7 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\humhub\commands\CronController.php(54): humhub\commands\CronController->runHourly() #8 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\modules\cron-daemon\controllers\ExternalServiceController.php(79): humhub\commands\CronController->actionRun() #9 [internal function]: humhub\modules\cronDaemon\controllers\ExternalServiceController->actionRunCron() #10 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\base\InlineAction.php(57): call_user_func_array(Array, Array) #11 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\base\Controller.php(178): yii\base\InlineAction->runWithParams(Array) #12 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\base\Module.php(552): yii\base\Controller->runAction('run-cron', Array) #13 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\web\Application.php(103): yii\base\Module->runAction('cron-daemon/ext...', Array) #14 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\protected\vendor\yiisoft\yii2\base\Application.php(384): yii\web\Application->handleRequest(Object(humhub\components\Request)) #15 D:\HostingSpaces\visky.net\vk_humhub_etech\index.php(25): yii\base\Application->run() #16 {main} | Q | A | ---------------- | --- | HumHub version | 1.? | PHP version | | Operating system | > Note: Also provide the full error stacks from `Administration --> Information --> Logging` and errors from your browser console if possible. > Note: Please use the [community](https://community.humhub.com) site for any questions on customizing HumHub.

commits.message: Fix #6547 Invalid class name validated as valid and improve validation (#6548)

Update BaseConverter.php (#6608)

Char case fix for getFileName method

Enh: `file` fields: `metadata` (#6594)

* Add `File.metadata`

* Mark experimental

* fixup! Add `File.metadata`

* Use `isModified()` rather than `count` to evaluate `null` before saving.
Improve scrolling to anchor with fixed header (#6615)

Fix undefined error on live event of follow action (#6614)

Co-authored-by: Lucas Bartholemy <luke-@users.noreply.github.com>
Add a link to "Module Administration" from Marketplace (#6619)
Change icon for add new user button (#6618)

Avoid PHP error when trying to download a file without guid in the URL params (#6621)

* Avoid PHP error when trying to download a file without guid in the URL params (return 404 exception instead)

* Added CHANGELOG-DEV

Enh #6623: Add a hint in the "Dropdown space order" settings to infor… (#6624)

* Enh #6623: Add a hint in the "Dropdown space order" settings to inform that a manual sort is always applied first

* Changed wording

* Update DesignSettingsForm.php

---------

Co-authored-by: Lucas Bartholemy <luke-@users.noreply.github.com>
